title: The Genie from downunder. - Vol. 1.
other_title: The Genie from down under. - Vol. 1.
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
Australian Children's Television Foundation, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
description: From the producers of "Round the twist" and "Skytrackers" comes a series about a young girl, Penelope Townes who finds a magic opal which contains two genies, Bruce and his son Baz. She thinks all her problems are over, and that she can have everything she wants. Bruce, however has other ideas. The first three episodes of this series are: "Wishing and hoping", "It's my opal...and I'll cry if I want to" and Where it's at.
